briefdescription.para: Returns the row at an index.
Returns the colum at an index.
Inserts row at the end or the matrix.
Inserts column at the end of the matrix.

detaileddescription.para:
d
details are shown below
d = 1 is accending order $\rightarrow$ sort_rows()
d = 0 is decending order $\rightarrow$ sort_rows(0)

i
row index
d
details are shown below
d = 1 is accending order $\rightarrow$ sort_rows()
d = 0 is decending order $\rightarrow$ sort_rows(0)

j
colum index
d
details are shown below
d = 1 is accending order $\rightarrow$ sort_rows()
d = 0 is decending order $\rightarrow$ sort_rows(0)

briefdescription.para: Does operations on a specefic colum.

detaileddescription.para:
LAMBDA
std::function
j
colum index
f
function to change colum elements
!!! warning "Exception"
All row and colum operations (inserting, removing .. etc) throw an std::invalid_argument if: 1. There is a size mismatch 2. Invalid index

n
the specifeid variable
!!! note "Note"
All the functions listed abover **mutate** the original matrix
